title: SF Add/Mult/Div
description: Add, multiply, or divide  RSF datasets

program.title: SF Add/Mult/Div
program.description: Add, multiply, or divide  RSF datasets

parameters.description:
The various operations, if selected, occur in the following order:
(1) Take absolute value,
(2) Add a scalar,
(3) Take the natural logarithm,
(4) Take the square root,
(5) Multiply by a scalar,
(6) Compute the base-e exponential,
(7) Add, multiply, or divide the data sets.

Beyond standard input, many other input files can be provided below. Note that each file must be separated, literally, by " ". For example:
   file1.rsf" "file2.rsf

parameters.placeholder: List of input files, separeted by " "

parameters.description:
All arrays below have the dimension
                          equal to the number of input files above.
Array of scalar values to add to each data set
Array of scale factor to multiply to each data set
Array of [y/n] to take the absolute value of input files
Array of [y/n] to compute exponential of input files
Array of [y/n] to take logarithm of input files
Array of [y/n] to take square root of input files
